meanings.sent1: The vines intwist around the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: She intwisted the ribbons to make a bow.
meanings.sent3: The two friends intwist their fingers to create a secret handshake.
meanings.sent4: The plot of the movie intwists in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The dance performance intwisted colorful ribbons in a mesmerizing display.

meanings.definition: To become twisted or twined together.
meanings.sent1: The ropes intwist easily if not properly stored.
meanings.sent2: The branches intwist in a natural pattern.
meanings.sent3: The phone cords intwist themselves into a tangled mess.
meanings.sent4: The stories intwist as they unfold, revealing hidden connections.
meanings.sent5: The yarn intwists into a beautiful pattern as the scarf is knitted.
